price: Ntwaremu bɛtware wͻn ne deε wͻpε paa no ntam sεdeε yεde yεε wͻn sεso foͻ no a wͻdii kan no. Nokorε sε (εberε a na wͻn wͻ wiaseε no) na wͻn adwen nsipi koraa (wͻ Wusͻreε no ho).
arabic: وَحِيلَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ مَا يَشۡتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشۡيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبۡلُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ فِي شَكّٖ مُّرِيبِۭ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waḥīla baynahum wabayna mā yashtahūna kamā fuʿila bi-ashyāʿihim min qablu innahum kānū fī shakkin murībin
translations: And a barrier will be placed
